entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of people who follow Voldemort, described as 'hardly believ[ing] their eyes' when they see him standing in silence.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, described as standing in silence and waiting for the Death Eaters.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Mentioned as having a grave that is enclosed by the circle of Death Eaters.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Mentioned as being present in the circle with Voldemort and Wormtail.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Described as a 'sobbing and twitching heap' that is part of the circle.

relationships.description: Voldemort is the leader of the Death Eaters, who follow him and show their loyalty by kissing his robes.
The Death Eaters form a circle around Tom Riddle's grave, showing their respect for their leader.
Voldemort and Harry are enemies, as indicated by the presence of both in the same circle.
The Death Eaters form a circle around Wormtail, who is described as part of their group.
